A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very uninteresting. They chickened out from perfect deaths for Leia and Finn. I don't give a crap about any of the characters. Captain Phasma was the only decent villain(quite good actually) but they only gave her like five minutes before having her die again. Where's Peter Cushing when you need him? The jokes were bad and out of place. Although there were some good moments\, like the initial bombing run and the duel\, The Last Jedi movie was a huge disappointment and a waste of thirteen dollars.
